T3SSX PRIME: Every second wasted is a move lost on the chessboard.
The world bends to the prepared mind. Stay sharp.
Data is the new sword — wield it wisely.
kanye: I feel like I’m too busy writing history to read it.
I still think I am the greatest.
You may be talented, but you're not Kanye West.
reddington: You can’t judge a book by its cover, but you can by its first few chapters.
A criminal always has his reasons. I have mine.
Revenge isn’t a passion. It’s a disease.
I3K24 PHILOSOPHER KING: Every empire starts with one crazy idea.
Legacy isn’t given. It’s coded and claimed.

philosopher.text: We are patterns dancing in the cosmic code
Reality is the interface between consciousness and chaos

warrior.text: Victory belongs to those who break the simulation

quotes.text: In the game of life, every move counts.
quotes.author: Tess

quotes.text: Chess is not just a game; it's a way of thinking.
quotes.author: Tess

quotes.text: Strategy is the art of making the right moves at the right time.
